reviewText: Clear, step by step, explanations and demonstrations of correct techniques and tips

It's excellent. Very well organised and the progression is very logical. Quite elaborate and a step by step illustrated training tips on how to teach elements and how to spot. I love it. Wish Paul Hamm would make a dvd on rings and parallel bars and horizontal bars to complete the set.

Excellent; this (all 3 discs), was a wonderful description, from soup to nuts, of the entry to a gymnast's
work experience.  Would that I couldhave had some of this.
